scenes.background: Bob looks thoughtful and turns to you.
scenes.description: Do you think we handled this situation the best we could?

options.text: I think we did well given the circumstances, but there's always room for improvement.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the effort made while suggesting future improvements, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy and perception could be stronger.

options.text: Honestly, I believe we could have managed things better with more foresight.
options.analysis: You express a critical view and emphasize the need for foresight, demonstrating good perception but lower in motivation and social skills.

options.text: We did what we could under the circumstances; let's focus on learning and moving forward.
options.analysis: You emphasize learning from the experience and moving forward, showing good self-regulation but could improve on perception and empathy.
